indentWidth.description: The number of characters for an indent.

indentStyle.description: Whether to use tabs or spaces.

lineWidth.description: How many characters can be written on a single line.

oneOf.description: Semicolons are always added at the end of each statement.
Semicolons are added only in places where it's needed, to protect from ASI.

quoteStyle.description: The type of quote used when representing string literals.

jsxQuoteStyle.description: The type of quote used in JSX attributes.

quoteProperties.description: Whether property names inside objects should be quoted.

oneOf.description: All properties are quoted if any property requires quoting.

arrowParentheses.description: Whether to add non-necessary parentheses to arrow functions.

oneOf.description: Parentheses are added only when necessary.

trailingCommas.description: Print trailing commas wherever possible in multi-line comma-separated syntactic structures.

oneOf.description: Trailing commas are added only in places where it's supported in ES5.

bracketSpacing.description: Surround the inner contents of some braces with spaces.

bracketSameLine.description: Place the last angle bracket in JSX tags on the same line as the last attribute.

oneOf.description: Each attribute is placed on its own line.

expand.description: Whether to expand object and array literals to multiple lines.

oneOf.description: Objects are expanded when the first property has a leading newline. Arrays are always collapsed unless they contain a newline.
Objects and arrays are always expanded.
Objects and arrays are never expanded, if they are shorter than the line width.

embeddedLanguageFormatting.description: Enable formatting for embedded languages (e.g., CSS, SQL, GraphQL) within template literals.

experimentalOperatorPosition.description: [EXPERIMENTAL - NOT FULLY SUPPORTED] Controls the position of operators in binary expressions when they wrap lines.

oneOf.description: Places the operator at the beginning of the next line.
Places the operator at the end of the current line.

experimentalTernaries.description: [EXPERIMENTAL - NOT FULLY SUPPORTED] Try prettier's new ternary formatting before it becomes the default behavior.

experimentalSortImports.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Sort import statements. When set, enables import sorting with the specified options.

newlinesBetween.description: Whether to insert blank lines between different import groups.

groups.description: Custom grouping of imports. Each inner array represents a group.
